Content.Text:
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A fine morning to you, <MYNAME>. You're
looking as dashing as ever.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A fine morning to you, <MYNAME>. Would
you like me to prepare you some tea?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A fine morning to you, <MYNAME>. Please
let me know if I can be of service to
you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Can I be of service, <MYNAME>? You were
just saying hello? How rude of me. Thank
you for your kindness.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Greetings to you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I would appreciate any advice you could
give me for living in this town.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It is always a pleasure to see you,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, it is thanks to your hard work
that this town has improved so much.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. It has become
quite late has it not?
<PAGE>
I'm sorry if I'm overstepping my bounds,
but I think it would be best for you to
return home soon.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. It has become
quite late has it not?
<PAGE>
Please watch your step on your way home.
If you were  to slip and fall, it would
simply be dreadful.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. It has become
quite late has it not?
<PAGE>
Shall I use the stars to predict
tomorrow's weather for you? Tomorrow's
weather will be...

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. You think my
expression is stiff? I beg to differ,
this is my usual expression.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I feel very fortunate to be able to see
your face, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I apologize for my rudeness. I should
have gone to greet you first.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is there some way that I might be of
service, <MYNAME>? If not, then I am
going to have to ask you to excuse me.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A pleasant day to you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I am pleased to see that you appear to
be doing well.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>. I have been waiting for
you.
<PAGE>
I do not feel like my day has really
started until I am able to say hello to
you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. It has become
quite late has it not?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>It would probably be best for you to
return home for the day.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. It has become
quite late has it not?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>I'm very pleased to see you, but I don't
believe that it's prudent to be out
walking around at this hour.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. It has become
quite late has it not? It's too late for
a lady to be out walking.
<PAGE>
I wish that I could accompany you
on your way home. Please be careful.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Is there
something you need?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. I'm very happy
that I get to take care of you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Mornings on the
farm are very busy, but the work feels
worthwhile.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is something wrong, <MYNAME>? Have you
finished all your work?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You've been doing wonderful work today,
<MYNAME>. Living on a farm is fun. Each
day is full of new discoveries.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You seem very busy today, <MYNAME>. I
wanted to talk, but I refrained from
doing so to avoid getting in your way.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, it has become quite late has
it not? If you do not go to sleep soon,
I fear you may still be tired tomorrow.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<MYNAME>, it has become quite late. I
would love to talk, but I don't want you
to wake up tired tomorrow.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>You don't care about waking up tired?
That may not be wise...Alright, let's
talk, but just for a little bit.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, it has become quite late has
it not? Have you finished all of your
work?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Please don't overexert yourself. I worry
about you a lot.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The temperature is just right around
this time of year. Don't you agree? It
helps my work go smoothly.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you working in the rain? Spring rain
can be surprisingly cold, so please be
careful not to fall ill.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The summer heat has been overwhelming
recently. Don't you agree? Please take
care of yourself.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is the rain around this time of year
good for crops? If so, I suppose it
isn't so bad.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love this time of year. There's just
something about the air that makes me
want to smile.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I don't mind when rain falls around this
time of year, because this rain is also
a part of the lovely season of fall.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's cold again today. Don't you agree?
I need to keep my body moving.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The snow in this town makes me feel
peaceful. Snow suits this town well.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Typhoons have furious destructive power
and can blow things away. It would be
best to stay inside today.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I had no idea that this much snow would
fall today. Nature is incredible, isn't
it?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Please don't go outside today. The wind
is strong, and it's very dangerous.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Please don't go outside today. There's
too much snow, and it's very dangerous.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A pleasant day to you, <MYNAME>. And
congratulations as well.
<PAGE>
Heh. I happened to hear that you are
now in a relationship. I hope that it is
enduring and brings you much happiness.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Master Amir is very fond of the nature
in this town. I'm fond of it as well.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The quietness of the forest is pleasing.
Don't you agree? It makes me feel very
peaceful.
<PAGE>
In particular, this forest feels
magical somehow.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Master Amir and I used to play in rivers
frequently. Ha ha. Just thinking about
it brings back fond memories.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The fish from this river taste
exquisite. I would like to share this
taste with my fellow countrymen.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Mountain views are always wonderful.
Don't you agree? I could stay here
forever.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Looking down on the town from this
mountain, you can really see how people
live. I can't resist coming here.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The scenery on a farm changes at such a
dizzying pace that I could come every
day and never tire of it.
<PAGE>
It's exciting to think about how the
farm will look tomorrow.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Farms are very pleasant. The unique
sounds of a peaceful farm put me in a
wonderful mood.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't you think that it's cold in here
without any sunlight? Please be careful
not to catch a cold.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
With my inexperienced eyes, I have no
clue where to get minerals.
<PAGE>
If I worked as a miner and built up
experience, I wonder if I too would be
able to tell where to find minerals.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town is lively. Yet it also somehow
feels peaceful. It's a very easy place
to live.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I'm sure it's thanks to the fact that
everyone has worked so hard to revive
this town.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town has become very lively. I'm
happy that the town is now flourishing
so much.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I'm very lucky that Master Amir and I
were  able to come and live in this
wonderful town.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The mansion that you so kindly built is
very comfortable <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Please think of it as your home away
from home and come visit whenever you
please.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you like herbs <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
I enjoy raising herbs, and I have
done some studying of herb cultivation.
<PAGE>
If you grow any herbs, please show them
to me so that I can learn from your
work.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What do butlers from our country do?
We deal with all aspects of life.
<PAGE>
In addition to cooking and laundry, I
organize governmental affairs and ensure
that official work goes smoothly.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Master Amir has a little sister, and her
butler is an old friend of mine.
<PAGE>
Even now, we exchange letters
frequently. I hope he's doing well.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I admire how you pursue your
livelihood with a sense of conviction.
<PAGE>
Without that conviction, I'm sure it
would be impossible to manage a farm
while reviving the town.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I want to do my best to follow your
example.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I don't have any relatives, but I've
never felt bad about that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>For me, being related by blood isn't
important.
<PAGE>
I find joy in faithfully serving the man
who saved me, that is, Master Amir's
father, and his family.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, I hope that you and Master
Amir continue to get along well.
<PAGE>
I'm sure that you have what it takes to
guide Master Amir to happiness.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What am I to you, <MYNAME>? I just don't
understand.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
I hope I'm mistaken, but I don't sense
any affection from you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can't believe what's happening. My
duty is to serve Master Amir. It's not
right for me to become happier than him.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I told Master Amir about our
relationship, he was very happy.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Honestly, I'm overjoyed. I hadn't
expected that Master Amir would be so
happy for me.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Master Amir says that my face has become
kinder.
<PAGE>
The only explanation I can think of is
you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I suppose that when I'm with you, I
naturally feel kinder.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you haven't changed since we
first met. You've always been cheerful,
and I feel better whenever I see you.
<PAGE>
I suppose that's what draws me to y...
Oh, never mind. Please forget what I
just said.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, recently, I haven't been able
to stop thinking about how lucky I am to
have come to this town.
<PAGE>
I'm not saying this as Master Amir's
butler, these are my personal feelings.
<PAGE>
I feel very fortunate to have been able
to meet you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Don't worry about me <MYNAME>. You're
busy with farm work aren't you?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<MYNAME>. I need you to stop this
nonsense.
<PAGE>
I had no idea that you could be so
immature. Honestly, I have no idea what
to do.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
We haven't been talking as much lately.
Have I done something to make you angry?
If so, please tell me what it is.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now that I live on the farm, I get more
opportunities to enjoy nature. Just
being at home makes me feel peaceful.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Please leave the housework to me. I'm
very used to taking care of housework.
<PAGE>
Also, if you tell me what you want to
eat, I can make it for you right away.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Marriage can really change a person.
<PAGE>
I never imagined that I could spend each
day feeling so much happiness.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, the one thing in this world
that I am certain of is that my love for
you will never change.
<PAGE>
It's kind of embarrassing to say that,
but it comes from the bottom of my
heart.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Well...What types of things should we
talk about in this kind of situation?
<PAGE>
I'm terribly sorry. I'm not very
familiar with this kind of situation.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I would like to say that
being with you was an incredibly
valuable experience for me.
<PAGE>
I'm very grateful to you. Thank you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
After we parted, I prayed that I might
be given the opportunity to be with you
again.
<PAGE>
Heh, my prayers were answered.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Our wedding is approaching. You can
relax and leave all the preparations to
me.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I feel a little lost, because I'm not
used to the locations of the kitchen and
cleaning utensils yet.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Knowing that my child will be born soon
is probably the greatest happiness that
I have ever experienced in my life.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, your stomach is getting
bigger, so you should avoid strenuous
exercise.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I'll take care of the housework, so
please get plenty of rest.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The doctor says that our child should be
coming soon.
<PAGE>
Don't worry. I'll be right next to you
when our child is born. Let's both do
our best.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm experienced at handling babies.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I used to take care of Master Amir's
little sister often. So you can rely on
me.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Master Amir is also absolutely in love
with <CHILD_NAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I suppose it's obvious that your child
would be cute, <MYNAME>. Hehe.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME> has really grown. I want to
teach them as much as possible. After
all, it couldn't hurt.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME> seems to be very pleased
about having grown so much.
<PAGE>
When I ask, <CHILD_NAME> happily does
things that were impossible before when
<CHILD_NAME> was too small.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A present? For me? I wonder what it
could be.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>It's herb pasta. I'm honored that you
know what my favorite food is.
<PAGE>
I'll enjoy this later. I'm so very
happy. Thank you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A present? For me? I wonder what it
could be.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>This is a very good present. It's one of
my most favorite foods. I will
gratefully accept this gift.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A present? For me? I wonder what it
could be.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Thank you. I'm very happy. This is one
of my favorite foods.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A present? For me?
Thank you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A present? For me? I wonder what it
could be.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>I'm not really very fond of this, but
it's the thought that counts, so I will
gratefully accept this gift.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A present? For me? I wonder what it
could be.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>You want me to have this? This gift is
not a good match for me. I don't know
what to do.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A present? For me? I wonder what it
could be.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>Chocolate jam? Chocolate jam is the one
thing in this world that I simply cannot
stand. I'll dispose of it properly.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this...for me?
Thank you.
<PAGE>
This is an impressive size. I can tell
that it was grown with loving care.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this...for me?
Thank you.
<PAGE>
Receiving something this big makes me
feel like a king.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this...for me? I appreciate the
sentiment, but I can't take this.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...That is useless for me now. Please
bring it back with you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What's this, <MYNAME>? I want you to show
your feelings through actions, not
things. I can't accept this now.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wouldn't feel right receiving so much
all at once. Please you should keep it.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I appreciate your feelings <MYNAME>, but
I couldn't possible receive more than
this.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You've already expressed your feelings
to me, <MYNAME>. Thank you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Is this herb pasta? It's so wonderful to
get a present like this on my birthday.
<PAGE>
Thank you. I'm so happy that I can't
help but smile.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You remembered my birthday? I'm honored.
Thank you very much.
<PAGE>
I can't believe that I'm receiving such
a wonderful present on my birthday.
I'll remember this day forever.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You remembered my birthday? I'm honored.
Thank you very much.
<PAGE>
I didn't think I would receive something
so nice today. Thank you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You remembered my birthday?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I'm very grateful for this present.
Thank you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You remembered my birthday? I'm honored.
Thank you very much.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>But it'd be better if you didn't give
me...never mind, it's nothing. Thank
you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You remembered my birthday? I'm honored.
Thank you very much.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>I suppose that means that this present
isn't just some kind of mistake. I'd be
happier if it were.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You remembered my birthday? I'm honored.
Thank you very much.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>But chocolate jam? I didn't expect that
you, of all people, would give me THIS.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You remembered my birthday? I'm honored.
Thank you very much.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>This is an impressive size. Did you
prepare this for me? Thank you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You remembered my birthday? I'm honored.
Thank you very much.
<PAGE>
I never thought I'd receive such a big
present for my birthday. I'm sure I'll
never forget this day.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Just looking at chicks makes me want
to protect them. Don't you agree?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That red comb on her head is quite cute.
Can I hold this chicken? She's rather
heavy, isn't she.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
When a chicken grows this big, it looks
like royalty. The way this chicken has
grown is quite impressive.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Can I pet this dog? Heh, its eyes show
that it really likes it. This is
relaxing.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This dog needs more exercise. This
sagging stomach isn't good. You should
give this dog more to do.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Large dogs like this look like good
guard dogs. We could probably use one
at the mansion.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A dog that's this fat won't make a good
guard dog. This dog needs to go on a
little diet.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Can I scratch this cat's neck? Heh, its 
eyes show that it really likes it. This
is relaxing.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This cat needs more exercise. He moves
sluggishly. You need to give him more to
do.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
There were cats like this in the royal
palace as well.
<PAGE>
Their fur is so soft that it's hard to
resist touching them.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This cat looks like he has a hard time
moving. It makes me want to do something
to help.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Is this flower, for me? Thank you very
much, <MYNAME>. It will make a wonderful
decoration.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I forgot that today was the flower
festival. I'm very grateful to receive
this from you, <MYNAME>. Thank you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. Even now that we're
married, it's clear that you still
appreciate me and think about me.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Are you giving this to me? Thank you
very much, <MYNAME>. I'm honored to
receive this from you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Receiving this thoughtful present brings
a smile to my face. I'm very grateful
for this, and I'll enjoy it later.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, is this for Winter Harmony
Day? Heh, thank you. I'm very grateful
for this, and I'll enjoy it later.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What is it, <MYNAME>? This is...pumpkin
festival candy...Is this for me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>No no. Since you went through the
trouble of getting this for me, I'll
gladly accept it.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is an interesting joke, <MYNAME>.
Getting pumpkin festival sweets for me.
Very funny.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Haha, alright, I'll take them. Thank
you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this a pumpkin festival present? This
isn't something that a wife is supposed
to give to her husband.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Heh, you're like a child. Thank you.
I'll eat this later.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I recall hearing that blue feathers are
used to signal one's desire to marry.
Who are you going to give it to?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
It's too soon for us. There are stages
to everything, and we haven't reached
the appropriate stage yet.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
